name: Name
subject: Subject
bio1: Hello, I am a software engineer based in London. At 17 years old, I moved from Greece to the UK for my studies. I first attended the University of Bradford for my Foundation Studies, and then I completed my undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Royal Holloway, University of London. Recently, I started working as an software engineer at Sky while simultaneously staying updated with the latest technological advancements.
bio2: I am passionate about continuous learning, building software, investing, sailing, scuba diving and music. I'm currently engaged in developing two applications using React, enhancing my understanding of algorithms, and preparing for the AWS certification exam.
bio3: In my leisure time, my activities vary by location; in the UK, I stay active with exercises, swimming, and cycling. Meanwhile, in Greece, you'll likely find me sailing, diving into the depths, or exploring the mountain trails.
